faq.question: How often should I have my solar panels cleaned in Brimfield, MA?
faq.answer: Brimfield solar systems typically benefit from professional cleaning 2-3 times per year due to the area's heavily wooded, rural environment. We recommend spring cleaning (to remove heavy pollen from Massachusetts forests), mid-summer cleaning (for dust and organic debris), and fall cleaning (before winter weather and leaf drop). Properties with significant tree coverage, near farms, or with ground-mount systems may require more frequent service. We'll evaluate your specific Brimfield location and environmental factors to provide a customized maintenance schedule.
